reviews.review_msg: Amazing professor. Professor Peiris covers everything we need to know in detail and also provides the theory behind formulas. He really cares about students and tries to help everyone understand the concepts. Also very approachable and helpful and responds well to feedback.
Super awesome guy. He really cares if you understand the concepts. Very friendly, humble and approachable.

Taught for a quarter at UC Davis for an intro. stats class. Very sweet professor who clearly cares for his students. Made occasional mistakes with tech or a stats problem, but otherwise taught pretty well.
